message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with computer vision and machine learning techniques for 3D human pose estimation from a single RGB image. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel multi-stage CNN architecture and uses probabilistic knowledge of 3D human pose, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The problem of 3D pose estimation also involves robotics and control, which are covered by cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also uses knowledge of plausible 3D landmark locations, which is related to reasoning and inference, and falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on the Human3.6M dataset, which is related to graphics and visualization, and falls under the category of cs.GR (Computer Graphics).
